text: (meya avadhanaya kala pasuda), musava ohuge vargikayingen samaharekma visvasa kalaha. ovunda tamanva firavunda, ohuge pradhaninda, vedana genadevido yayi biya veminma sitiyaha. mandayat niyata vasayenma firavun ema desayehi itamat balasampannayeku vasayen siti bÃ¦vin simava ikmava (duk karadara Ã¦ti) karamin sitiyeya
